name: Who did it? (ArberZefi2)
description:
Its a game based on a tik tok trend with guessing who did something bad and usually its the most different one. If you want to guess everything right you have to think without logic.Have fun playing my amazing game.

                                                                       PRO TIP 

             think racist and nonsense

                                                                      Who am i? 

 I am a new gamedeveloper with almost a year of experience.To support me follow and download my games. If you want to support me even more DONATE!
